Description: 1. Sourcing and Candidate Attraction: Utilize various recruitment channels, including job boards, social media, professional networks, and employee referrals, to identify potential candidates. Create engaging job postings and manage the company's career pages to attract suitable applicants.2. Screening and Interviewing: Review resumes and applications to shortlist candidates who meet the job requirements. Conduct initial phone screenings and interviews to assess candidates' skills, experience, and cultural fit.3. Candidate Evaluation: Collaborate with hiring managers to evaluate candidates' qualifications, strengths, and weaknesses. Provide insights and recommendations to assist in the decision-making process.4. Applicant Tracking and Documentation: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of candidates in the applicant tracking system. Ensure compliance with relevant data protection and employment laws.5. Employer Branding: Contribute to enhancing the company's employer brand by creating a positive candidate experience throughout the recruitment process.6. Recruitment Strategy: Work with the HR team to develop effective recruitment strategies, including diversity and inclusion initiatives, to attract a diverse pool of candidates.Interested Candidate please share your resume topampita.saha@technosolis.inJob Location : Kolkata( On-site)Experience : 6 months to 1 YearSalary : 15kShift Timing : 10am to 7pmInformation Technology & ServicesFull-timeJob Details
